lines.text:
[talking to Alex]
We're a funny pair, aren't we? I can't go forward, and you can't go back.

[shortly after having checked into their hotel room]
Where are you goin'?
Water Closet. If they don't have one, I'm gonna' use the stairs.

[asks Alex to unzip the back of her dress]
Would you undo this, please?
Hey, wait just a minute here... What the hell are you doing?
I am hot, sweetheart. So I am going to take my dress off and sit here in my bra and panties, all right?
Hell no! Leave that dress alone! We're having a civilized conversation here, we don't want a naked woman flappin' her twat in the breeze.
Hey Mills, I hope you're dead, but if you're alive, say something.

[face down on the floor]
I'm... not... dead!
You killed Felix Crawley, didn't you, Señor Mills?
I guess you spicoes ain't so dumb after all.
